attributes.action: Stop the paying of benefits to Anjem Choudary, and call for his immediate deportation.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Anjem Choudary seems to constantly incite bad feeling in the community and is causing hatred towards muslims, despite not speaking for the muslim community.

We call for the government to stop paying benefits to this man, who is carrying out Sharia Weddings, therefore is capable of supporting himself, and call for his immediate deportation.

rejection.details: We do not accept petitions relating to an individual's circumstances.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
